textBox.richText: Olive trees and the warm sea...

We just got back from a week of snorkeling and eating fried cheese in Corfu, which was very relaxing and warm. Much de-stressed and very happy with that. Holiday Tip: Don’t go snorkeling with your lady friend's compact digital camera in your pocket. You might be able to rescue the photos off the memory card (we did thanks to Silke’s bro Christian and some contact cleaner) but the camera will be toast (yes, It was... i took it apart and it was full of corrosion... totally boned). For more photos, click on the photo above or Corfu 2010 at the top of the page.
